Uses of Interface
fast3d.math.geom.GeometricObject

  • Packages that use GeometricObject 
    Package Description
    fast3d.math.geom  
    fast3d.renderables  
    fast3d.util.math  

    • Uses of GeometricObject in fast3d.math.geom

      Classes in fast3d.math.geom that implement GeometricObject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Plate
      representing a geometric (infinitely large) plate in 3d space
      a mathematical plate has no thickness or other properties other than it's base position and orientation
      class  Point
      representing a geometric point (a position in 3d-space)
      a point has no real width or diameter so it is infinitely small - also it has no other properties than it's position (e.g. no color)
      class  Straight
      representing a geometric (infinitely long) straight line
      a mathematical straight has no end or begin and no thickness and has no other properties than it's position and orientation

    • Uses of GeometricObject in fast3d.renderables

      Classes in fast3d.renderables that implement GeometricObject 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Pixel
      visualized like a 3d-pixel (a point with a width of 1px and a color)
      no matter how far the camera is away, a pixel will always be shaded to the size of one single pixel on the screen
      points/pixels disappear on mathematically correct ray-tracing imaging, because they have no actual width (like when using the DefaultFragmentShader)

    • Uses of GeometricObject in fast3d.util.math

      Methods in fast3d.util.math that return GeometricObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GeometricObject RelationshipAnalytics.findCorrespond(Renderable r)
      for a given renderable that is instance either of the following the result will be the geometric object that contains the renderable as a subset of points Pixel to Point Line to Straight Triangle or Rectangle to Plate
      Methods in fast3d.util.math with parameters of type GeometricObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyzeGeneral(GeometricObject a, GeometricObject b)
      a wrapper to analyze(GeometricalObject,GeometricalObject,0.0) with zeroLockControl disabled
      static Relationship RelationshipAnalytics.analyzeGeneral(GeometricObject a, GeometricObject b, double zeroLockControl)
      a wrapper around all other analyze methods casting automatically points, straights and triangles/plates
